channel.title: Changing Server Ip
channel.description:
[b]Ok So Ive Got A Problem..... Ive Made My Server Ip... Because I Have No Router Im Letting My Friend Host For Me.. So I Downloaded UTorrent For Him And Changed Port To 43594 I Saved Then I Downloaded No-Ip On His Computer From Team Viewer I Loged Onto My Account From That DUC No-ip And Ticked The Server Ip...
BUt Every Time I Try Adding It To The Server It Wont Let Me Log In.. I Dont Know If Ive Added Them Properly..
If Anyone Could Help Me With This Problem Ill Be Very Happy.. Also Ive Got Team Viewer 6 If You Need To Connect To Help..
Thank You [/b]

item.title: Changing Server Ip
item.dc:creator: @Bonjour Bonjour
item.description:
@Bonjour wrote:

Try letting him make his own, because sometimes No-Ip’s gets your IP Address from the site, and/or, try portforwarding instead of Uturrent.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Server Ip
item.dc:creator: @JuniorCautionz JuniorCautionz
item.description:
@JuniorCautionz wrote:

[b]Ok So Ive Got A Problem…
Ive Made My Server Ip…
Because I Have No Router Im Letting My Friend Host For Me… So I Downloaded UTorrent For Him And Changed Port To 43594 I Saved Then I Downloaded No-Ip On His Computer From Team Viewer I Loged Onto My Account From That DUC No-ip And Ticked The Server Ip…

BUt Every Time I Try Adding It To The Server It Wont Let Me Log In… I Dont Know If Ive Added Them Properly…

If Anyone Could Help Me With This Problem Ill Be Very Happy… Also Ive Got Team Viewer 6 If You Need To Connect To Help…

Thank You [/b]
